resources.string: This activity tells us about the current song running on our app. \nThis activity contains buttons for moving to next song or going back to previous song. \nThese are some clickable images given above shows the Toast messages.
This activity contains the description of playlist and also shows the recently added music to the library. \nUser can add Favourite songs into the playlist.
This activity show us the setting about downloading and information of the user account. \nUser can refresh the app ,can change the storage location etc.
This activity contains the list of songs that are currently present in the device. \nMoreover if the user download the song it stores that song int its library.
This activity shows the payment procedure for the payment of this app. \nTo continue enjoying the entertainment you must proceed to the payment app.
